contest-event.event-date:
May 14, 2005 D SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (Championship Section)
SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (Championship Section) 1 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest ebbw-vale-contest-championship-section
Ebbw Vale Leisure Centre, Ebbw Vale, Blaenau Gwent, Wales, UK Best instrumentalist - Euphonium Burry Port. Best horn - Tongwynlais. Prizes - 1st £125, 2nd £75, 3rd £60. 7 bands competed
Jan. 4, 2010, 9:59 p.m. June 30, 2020, 4:11 p.m.
1 Tredegar Town Band Michael Fowles Cloudcatcher Fells
2 Burry Port Town Michael Thorne Montage
3 Tongwynlais Temperance Band Gareth Pritchard Connotations
4 Parc and Dare Band Craig Roberts The Year of the Dragon
5 Abergavenny Borough Band Alun Williams Chivalry
6 Ammanford Silver Band Colin Hogg English Heritage
7 Treherbert & District Band Graham Sheppard Diadem of Gold
Withdrawn BTM Band Thomas Wyss
Withdrawn Thomas Coaches Mid Rhondda Band Alan Gibbs
